content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) with drop position (-27.5, -59.5)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 260 coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Secondary Mining and Smelting Setup at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53)
- Input chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing 44 iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (systems 10729, 10731)
- Electricity network (id 13759) connecting multiple poles

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) containing iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Ensure target chests exist and contain the requested items before attempting extraction
- Verify the correct chest positions when trying to extract items

### Production Issues
- Keep track of all required ingredients before starting production
- The automation science pack assembly machine needs both copper plates and iron gear wheels to function

### Power System Issues
- Monitor fuel levels in boilers to maintain consistent power generation
- Add fuel to boilers before they run completely empty

### Mining Equipment Issues
- Keep mining drills fueled to prevent work stoppage
- Monitor fuel levels in burner mining drills regularly
- Add fuel before equipment runs completely empty

### Inserter Operation Issues
- Ensure inserters have both fuel and valid pickup/drop positions
- Verify inserter directions match the intended material flow
